content: and 4 color w is white b is black when you finish a w or b section drop the yarn behind your work and pick up on the next pass carry the mc yarn through your stitches the entire way so there is no ws or rs you will need to be aware of your gauge so the yarn does not show chain 2 does not count as a stitch always do your first st of the row in the same st as the turning chain r1 in mc chain 21 turn r2 in mc double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in each chain across turn 19 dcs in each row for the entire clue r3 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r4 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r5 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r6 chain 2 6 double_crochet in mc 7 double_crochet in w 6 double_crochet in mc turn r7 chain 2 5 double_crochet in mc 9 double_crochet in w 5 double_crochet in mc turn r8 chain 2 4 double_crochet in mc 11 double_crochet in w 4 double_crochet in mc turn r9 chain 2 4 double_crochet in mc 11 double_crochet in w 4 double_crochet in mc turn r10 chain 2 5 double_crochet in mc 9 double_crochet in w 5 double_crochet in mc turn r11 chain 2 6 double_crochet in mc 7 double_crochet in w 6 double_crochet in mc turn r12 chain 2 7 double_crochet in mc 5 double_crochet in w 7 double_crochet in mc turn r13 chain 2 6 double_crochet in mc 7 double_crochet in w 6 double_crochet in mc turn r14 chain 2 5 double_crochet in mc 9 double_crochet in w 5 double_crochet in mc turn r15 chain 2 6 double_crochet in mc 7 double_crochet in w 6 double_crochet in mc turn r16 chain 2 7 double_crochet in mc 5 double_crochet in w 7 double_crochet in mc turn r17 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 3 double_crochet in w 8 double_crochet in mc turn r18 chain 2 7 double_crochet in mc 5 double_crochet in w 7 double_crochet in mc turn r19 chain 2 7 double_crochet in mc 5 double_crochet in w 7 double_crochet in mc turn r20 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 3 double_crochet in w 8 double_crochet in mc turn finish off w r21 chain 2 6 double_crochet in mc 7 double_crochet in b 6 double_crochet in mc turn r22 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 3 double_crochet in b 8 double_crochet in mc turn r23 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 3 double_crochet in b 8 double_crochet in mc turn r24 chain 2 8 double_crochet in mc 3 double_crochet in b 8 double_crochet in mc turn finish off b r25 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r26 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn r27 in mc chain 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn finish off sew in ends part 2 mc
